entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.1°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
